casebody.data:
M.T., The Father, Appellant,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES, et al., Appellees. No. 3D18-314 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed September 20, 2018. M.T., the father, in proper person. Karla Perkins, for appellee Department of Children and Families; Thomasina Moore, Statewide Director of Appeals, and Laura J. Lee (Sanford), for appellee Guardian ad Litem Program; Children & Youth Law Clinic, and Robert Latham, for R.T., the child. Before ROTHENBERG, C.J., and SALTER and LOGUE, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
